metadata.reset:
Restoring factory settings returns your Z-Wave Plus Extender to its default settings and removes Z-Wave device definitions.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
To restore factory settings:
1. Tap . The main menu appears.
2. Tap Settings. The Settings menu appears.
Tap Z-Wave. The Z-Wave screen appears.
Tap Reset to Factory
